name: The Nations
summary: The Nations is a real-time strategy game for Windows based on building a nation and conquering others. The player may choose from 3 races – the Pimmons, the Amazons and the Sajikis. Select a tribe and build up a harmonious community, rulling over them honestly and fairly, discovering new lands and skills, fighting for survival and power. You are now in control of the lives of tribes within The Nations. Take into account that everyone is an individual with their very own habits and characteristics that need to be nurutred and developed.
